title: Create Fan Club Newsletter
description: A fan engagement coordinator needs to create and send the monthly fan club newsletter.

tasks.description: Gather content for the newsletter, such as recent news, upcoming events, and a player spotlight.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles all the necessary content.

tasks.description: Populate the newsletter template with the content.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the final version of the newsletter.

tasks.description: Send the newsletter to all registered fan club members.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the email to all members.
